about_the_game:
The Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith Demo offers a more limited experience compared to the full version. In this edition, you will experience the essential knowledge about the running your own blacksmith shop in a medieval castle. Don't forget to wishlist the full game to continue your ultimate blacksmith journey.

Before you start, talk to the king of this castle and get the necessary information.



Mine precious ores, process them and craft the most legendary weapons to meet civils & soldiers needs!



Craft legendary weapons, enchant mystical artifacts, and unlock the secrets of the forge.



The residents and soldiers of this medieval castle need some weapons. Mine precious metals, process them and craft the most legendary weapons to meet customers needs!

Explore the fascinating world of a blacksmith, mine valuable ores, craft fabled weaponry, and become a master forger in a fantasy medieval world!

Dont forget to add Wishlist the full game "Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith". Here, your each swing of the hammer shapes your destiny. Explore the fantastic world, mine valuable ores, craft fabled weaponry, and become a master blacksmith in a realistic medieval world!

name: Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith Demo
short_description: Enter the core of craftsmanship with Medieval Crafter: Blacksmith Demo. Explore the fascinating world of a blacksmith, mine valuable ores, craft fabled weaponry and become an expert blacksmith in a medieval fantasy world!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish
